attributes.additional_details:
To help encourage consumer spending and hence stop the economy from shrinking and going into further recession.

The reduction in interest rates alone will not help encourage consumer spending in what is a very uncertain future. The removal of VAT from retail, construction and manufacturing will act as an economic stimulus and will help encourage spending (both physical and online). People will be encouraged to for example purchase goods, build home extensions and purchase vehicles.
attributes.background: Suspend VAT for 6-months on retail, construction, manufacturing and other key sectors of our economy so as to help encourage consumer spending and stimulate recovery of the UK economy
